metadata.description: Regulatory context and status for Hovfaret 13 project

current_status.summary: Area plan adopted September 2023 requires demolition, but plan is not legally binding due to objections. Project pursuing exemption through building permit process.
current_status.reason: Objections from Bane NOR and Statens vegvesen pending at Statsforvalteren

byplangrep_skoyen_2015.description: Skøyen designated as development hub - 'flerfunksjonell, tett 24-timers by som åpner seg mot fjorden'
byplangrep_skoyen_2015.impact: Sets framework for area development including Hovfaret 13

omraaderegulering_skoyen_2023.description: Area regulation requiring demolition of Hovfaret 13 and 10m setback from Hoffselva

hovfaret_13_specific.permitted_use: Kontor, handel, min. 20% bolig i feltet
hovfaret_13_specific.height_restriction_issue: Building fundamented for 12 floors but limited to 7 - regulatory mismatch

utilization.comment: Significant development headroom if height restrictions changed

project_strategy.approach: Seek exemption through building permit (rammesøknad) process
key_arguments: Transformation is more sustainable than demolition (48% lower CO₂)
Building already structurally designed for 12 floors
legal_basis: Exception provisions in Plan- og bygningsloven
New requirement to assess reuse alternatives (ombruksalternativ)
Municipality discretion for smaller extensions meeting sustainability goals

byraad_james_lorentzen.engagement: Meeting January 2024 - initial interest in transformation approach

bydel_ullern.interest: Potential Omsorg+ partnership - need for 70+ elderly housing units

skoyen_omradeforum.engagement: Submitted joint input to Oslo KPS (October 2024)

neighboring_properties.context: Part of coordinated area development on Skøyen/Hoff

relevant_properties.status: Also fundamented for 12 floors, limited to 7 by regulations

key_documents.title: 241106 H13 plan forutsetninger
key_documents.description: Documentation of planning prerequisites and historical context

key_documents.title: 241024 Innspill Oslo KPS fra Skøyen Områdeforum
key_documents.description: Joint input to Oslo municipality planning strategy
